channel.title: Action timer help
channel.description:
Alright so basically I'm making the skill buttons to tele you to a certain place when pressed.
I have all the coding done but It's been over 2 years since I've coded up until a month ago.
Basically I forget how to do a few things and this is one of them so please help :)
I need an action timer so you can't tele away using the buttons while you are in combat.

item.title: Action timer help
item.dc:creator: @bobbarker369 bobbarker369
item.description:
@bobbarker369 wrote:

I’ve been coding for 1.2 years or so…Like i said i took a break for 2 years due to real life matters so i’ve forgotten a lot. Thanks for the reply though :).

Read full topic

item.title: Action timer help
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

I doubt you’ve been coding for 2 years but I think I have this answer…
Idk if this would work but…

case #: // description if (absY == #) { if (!teleblock) { teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####; } else if (teleblock) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); } } break;

Or…

if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting.");

(No one flam this post… This isnt exactly my best coding subject)

Read full topic
